title: Reasons for eating fast food in the U.S. as of August 2014
summary: This bar chart has 5 categories for the x axis representing Response, and a y axis representing Share of respondents.
The highest category is found at Convenient where Share of respondents is 67.2.
The lowest category is found at Other where Share of respondents is 5.6.
gold: This statistic shows the reasons for eating fast food in the United States as of August 2014 . During the survey , 13.2 percent of respondents said that they ate fast food because they lacked other options .
